title: Is it considered cheating when using essay writing services online? - Quora

response.answer_text: The use of online essay writing services cannot be considered as cheating because of the professionalism with which the client’s work is handled. The only thing that would make the use of online essay writing services a form of cheating is if instances of plagiarism are noted in the work that is submitted back to the tutor for marking.
